description.lang: The Panic Button is a portable wireless switch designed to control the Panic/Disarm status of other associated devices thru the Z-Wave controller. After receiving the signals emitted by the Panic Button, the Z-Wave controller can then give commands or operate according to its own settings. Its great compatibility with Z-Wave products makes it suitable for smart home cloud based platforms.

Association with 4 nodes (i.e. end devices such as smart plugs and other lighting controllers).This allows the On/Off module to receive commands directly from these end devices without the participation of the controller.
